arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen held by Borussia Mönchengladbach despite Malik Tillman strike
arts.sum: Leverkusen welcomed Gladbach to the BayArena for Kasper Hjulmand's second Bundesliga match where the Danish coach was seeking back-to-back wins following a 3-1 victory against Eintracht Frankfurt last time out. Malik Tillman celebrates after scoring what looked to be the match-winning goal for Bayer Leverkusen before Gladbach's late equaliser - IMAGO/BEAUTIFUL SPORTS/Meusel

arts.ttl: Gladbach secure late draw in Leverkusen
arts.sum: Eugen Polanski's Borussia Mönchengladbach leave Leverkusen with a late point after their first goal of the season.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: The lineups are out for Gladbach’s trip to Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Die Fohlen searching for first win
arts.sum: Managerless Borussia Mönchengladbach will attempt to claim their first win of the Bundesliga season when they face Bayer Leverkusen on Sunday.
